thread.title: GOP Congressman: Skipping Trump Inauguration Is ‘Bad For The Country’
thread.title_full: GOP Congressman: Skipping Trump Inauguration Is ‘Bad For The Country’

author: Justin Koski
title: GOP Congressman: Skipping Trump Inauguration Is ‘Bad For The Country’
text:
Video Transcript: 
Rep. Sean Duffy, R-Wis., has had enough of Democrats boycotting Trump’s inauguration. 
DUFFY: I’m disappointed that all these Democrats are saying they are going to stay home. It’s like I was a little kid and I’m used to getting a juice box and a trophy no matter whether I win or I lose. Listen, Democrats lost, Donald Trump won. You might not like him and you might not agree with his agenda, just like we didn’t agree with President Obama’s agenda. But show up. That’s your duty as a Republican congressman. Be part of the process, because what this does, Chris, is in the future what happens with the next Democrat president-elect that goes through their nomination? Are Republicans now supposed to say that, ‘We’re going to stay home?’ That these events become partisan in nature? That’s bad for the country. Show up, be part of it. Put your big boy pants on and let’s start working together. Advertisement - story continues below
